title: Google Photos redesign of Library tab delayed and will see changes
content:
Just over four weeks ago, Google announced that Photos for Android and iOS would get pretty significant updates to two core parts of the app. That Google Photos redesign of the Library tab has now been delayed.

description: Just over four weeks ago, Google announced that Photos for Android and iOS would redesign the Library tab, but a delay to that rollout...
